TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit TrackingWorkflowExceptionEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

summary.span: 包含工作流程執行個體執行期間所發生之例外狀況的相關資料。

span.span: Contains data associated with an exception that occurs during the execution of a workflow instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)] 當工作流程執行個體執行期間發生例外狀況，而且與工作流程執行個體關聯的 包含為 設定的 時，工作流程追蹤基礎結構會在傳送至追蹤服務的 中將 設定成 。When an exception occurs during the execution of a workflow instance and a that is associated with the workflow instance includes a configured for a , the workflow tracking infrastructure sets to an in the that it sends to the tracking service. > [!NOTE] > 只有執行階段追蹤服務會使用 ，在 中傳遞資訊。 is used only by the runtime tracking service to pass information in a . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將示範一個名稱為 `WriteExceptionEventArgs` 的方法，該方法會擷取 。The following code example demonstrates a method, named `WriteExceptionEventArgs`, which captures a . 程式碼會檢查 屬性是否為 `null` (Visual Basic 中的 `Nothing`)。The code checks whether the property is `null` (`Nothing` in Visual Basic). 如果不是，程式碼會將與 屬性關聯的訊息寫入主控台。If it is not, the code writes the message associated with the property to the console. 此外，程式碼會將 屬性的值轉換成字串並寫入主控台中。In addition, the code converts the value of the property to a string and writes it to the console. 這個程式碼範例是 Program.cs 檔案中＜EventArgs 追蹤 SDK＞範例的一部分。This code example is part of the EventArgs Tracking SDK sample from the Program.cs file. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[< EventArgs 追蹤範例](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/94818da2-c3c4-4a13-b47a-a0fb30dbbf1c)。For more information, see [EventArgs Tracking Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/94818da2-c3c4-4a13-b47a-a0fb30dbbf1c). [!code-csharp[WF_Samples#289](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/cs/snippets24.cs#289)] [!code-vb[WF_Samples#289](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/vb/snippets24.vb#289)]

summary.span: 取得目前擲回例外狀況之活動的 。

span.span: Gets the of the activity currently throwing the exception.

value.span: 目前擲回例外狀況之活動的 。

span.span: The of the activity currently throwing the exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 例外狀況會在例外狀況處理常式活動鏈結中向上傳遞。Exceptions are passed up the chain of exception handler activities. 例外狀況處理常式可能選擇再次擲回例外狀況。An exception handler may choose to throw an exception again. 例外處理常式再次擲回例外狀況時，將會向執行階段追蹤基礎結構引發包含新的 的新例外狀況追蹤事件。When an exception handler throws the exception again, a new exception tracking event containing a new is raised to the runtime tracking infrastructure. 會參考目前擲回例外狀況的活動。 refers to the activity that is currently throwing the exception.

public: property Exception ^ Exception { Exception ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得由工作流程執行個體擲回的 。

span.span: Gets the that is being thrown by the workflow instance.

value.span: 由工作流程執行個體擲回的例外狀況。

span.span: The exception that is being thrown by the workflow instance.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將示範一個名稱為 `WriteExceptionEventArgs` 的方法，該方法會擷取 。The following code example demonstrates a method, named `WriteExceptionEventArgs`, which captures a . 程式碼會檢查 屬性是否為 `null` (Visual Basic 中的 `Nothing`)。The code checks whether the property is `null` (`Nothing` in Visual Basic). 如果不是，程式碼會將與 屬性關聯的訊息寫入主控台。If it is not, the code writes the message associated with the property to the console. 如果 Exception 為 `null` (`Nothing`)，程式碼會將 屬性的值轉換成字串並寫入主控台中。If Exception is `null` (`Nothing`), the code converts the value of the property to a string and writes it to the console. 這個程式碼範例是 Program.cs 檔案中＜EventArgs 追蹤 SDK＞範例的一部分。This code example is part of the EventArgs Tracking SDK Sample from the Program.cs file. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[< EventArgs 追蹤範例](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/94818da2-c3c4-4a13-b47a-a0fb30dbbf1c)。For more information, see [EventArgs Tracking Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/94818da2-c3c4-4a13-b47a-a0fb30dbbf1c). remarks.format: ## Remarks 例外狀況會在例外狀況處理常式活動鏈結中向上傳遞。Exceptions are passed up the chain of exception handler activities. 例外狀況處理常式可能選擇再次擲回例外狀況。An exception handler may choose to throw an exception again. 例外處理常式再次擲回例外狀況時，將會向執行階段追蹤基礎結構引發包含新的 的新例外狀況追蹤事件。When an exception handler throws an exception again, a new exception tracking event containing a new is raised to the runtime tracking infrastructure. 會參考原先擲回例外狀況的活動。 refers to the activity that originally threw the exception. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將示範一個名稱為 `WriteExceptionEventArgs` 的方法，該方法會擷取 。The following code example demonstrates a method, named `WriteExceptionEventArgs`, which captures a . 程式碼會檢查 屬性是否為 `null` (Visual Basic 中的 `Nothing`)。The code checks whether the property is `null` (`Nothing` in Visual Basic). 如果不是，程式碼會將與 屬性關聯的訊息寫入主控台。If it is not, the code writes the message associated with the property to the console. 如果 為 `null` (`Nothing`)，程式碼會將 屬性的值轉換成字串並寫入主控台中。If is `null` (`Nothing`), the code converts the value of the property to a string and writes it to the console. 這個程式碼範例是 Program.cs 檔案中＜EventArgs 追蹤 SDK＞範例的一部分。This code example is part of the EventArgs Tracking SDK Sample from the Program.cs file. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[< EventArgs 追蹤範例](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/94818da2-c3c4-4a13-b47a-a0fb30dbbf1c)。For more information, see [EventArgs Tracking Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/94818da2-c3c4-4a13-b47a-a0fb30dbbf1c).
